title: Aladdin Pita
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A good selection of vegan options including musabbaha, foule mudammas, mezza, manakeesh and maqaali. Also vegan are 7 of their sandwiches and 3 of their stews and more. Vegan and vegetarian items specially marked on menu. Over half the menu is vegetarian.
